languages.text: Шанс данного существа на критическое попадание увеличен на +50%. Силы еретиков отступили вглубь мануфакторума и, сплотившись, приготовились дать последний бой Вольному Торговцу.
languages.original_text: This creature's critical hit chance is increased by +50%. The heretic forces retreated deeper into the manufactorum and rallied together to take the last stand against the Rogue Trader.

languages.text: 此生物的暴击率提高50%。异端分子朝制造工厂深处撤退，集结在一起，对行商浪人进行最后的反抗。
languages.original_text: This creature's critical hit chance is increased by +50%. The heretic forces retreated deeper into the manufactorum and rallied together to take the last stand against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 此生物的暴击率提高50%。异端分子朝制造工厂深处撤退，集结在一起，对行商浪人进行最后的反抗。

languages.text: Die kritische Trefferchance dieser Kreatur wird um +50% erhöht. Die ketzerischen Truppen haben sich tiefer in das Manufactorum zurückgezogen und sich dort gesammelt, um sich dem letzten Kampf gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu stellen.
languages.original_text: This creature's critical hit chance is increased by +50%. The heretic forces retreated deeper into the manufactorum and rallied together to take the last stand against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Die kritische Trefferchance dieser Kreatur wird um +50% erhöht. Die ketzerischen Truppen haben sich tiefer in das Manufactorum zurückgezogen und sich dort gesammelt, um sich dem letzten Kampf gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu stellen.

languages.text: La probabilidad de impacto crítico de esta criatura aumenta un +50 %. Las fuerzas heréticas se retiraron al corazón del manufactorum y se aprestaron para una última batalla contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: This creature's critical hit chance is increased by +50%. The heretic forces retreated deeper into the manufactorum and rallied together to take the last stand against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: La probabilidad de impacto crítico de esta criatura aumenta un +50 %. Las fuerzas heréticas se retiraron al corazón del manufactorum y se aprestaron para una última batalla contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: Les chances de coup critique de cette créature augmentent de +50 %. Les forces hérétiques se replièrent dans les profondeurs du manufactorum et se rassemblèrent pour livrer un baroud d'honneur contre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: This creature's critical hit chance is increased by +50%. The heretic forces retreated deeper into the manufactorum and rallied together to take the last stand against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Les chances de coup critique de cette créature augmentent de +50 %. Les forces hérétiques se replièrent dans les profondeurs du manufactorum et se rassemblèrent pour livrer un baroud d'honneur contre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: このクリーチャーのクリティカルヒットが＋50％増加した。異端者の勢力は聖工場の奥深くまで退却し、自由開拓者に対する最後の抵抗のために結集した。
languages.original_text: This creature's critical hit chance is increased by +50%. The heretic forces retreated deeper into the manufactorum and rallied together to take the last stand against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: このクリーチャーのクリティカルヒットが＋50％増加した。異端者の勢力は聖工場の奥深くまで退却し、自由開拓者に対する最後の抵抗のために結集した。

languages.text: Bu yaratığın kritik vuruş olasılığı, %50 oranında arttı. Kâfir kuvvetler, manufaktorumun derinliklerine doğru geri çekildi ve Hür Tacir'e karşı son direniş için toplandı.
languages.original_text: This creature's critical hit chance is increased by +50%. The heretic forces retreated deeper into the manufactorum and rallied together to take the last stand against the Rogue Trader.
